Lionel:
When they fought with the Orcs, the Elves taught Human Magic to help them defeat. Therefore, they built a School of Witchcraft here, and, choosing talented People, taught them magic.
However, after the People betrayed the Elves, this place was abandoned and is now in ruins. Then, with the help of magic, people became able to conquer the entire continent. Now, I think, the kind of People is perhaps the most cruel and most selfish.
